name: places/ChIJmY19vIdZwokRbuO1rChUUKg
formattedAddress: 104 Forsyth St #1, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 104 Forsyth St #1, New York, NY 10002-5107, USA

originalText.text: I found this place on a whim while visiting NYC from Connecticut. I had a wonderful experience and got exactly what I was looking for. I have naturally very thick hair and the ladies took their time washing, cutting, and styling my hair. $30 before tip for a wash (which was really a wash + scalp, shoulder, neck, and upper back massage) and layered cut. I will definitely be returning!

text.text: I found this place on a whim while visiting NYC from Connecticut. I had a wonderful experience and got exactly what I was looking for. I have naturally very thick hair and the ladies took their time washing, cutting, and styling my hair. $30 before tip for a wash (which was really a wash + scalp, shoulder, neck, and upper back massage) and layered cut. I will definitely be returning!

originalText.text: I highly recommend this hair salon. The price for a wash, cut, and blow-dry for ladies is $35, excluding tax, which is quite reasonable and affordable. As soon as I entered the salon, the lady who would wash my hair warmly welcomed me. I was very satisfied with her hair-washing service, to the point of being pleasantly surprised. She washed twice, the first time for cleansing and the second time for deep cleaning and a massage! In addition to the scalp massage, she also gave massages to the neck and upper back. I must say, the water temperature and pressure for hair-washing were just right. Most importantly, my hair became very smooth and voluminous. I also recommend Jack, the hairstylist; he is a skilled and fun guy with over ten years of experience. I asked for layered cuts, and I was quite happy with the result (he styled this one-time wavy look for me, even though I'm not naturally wavy). Overall, I love the atmosphere of this salon, and I'm glad my first haircut experience in New York was at this place. If you speak Mandarin/Cantonese, I highly recommend chatting with the staff; they are very interesting and friendly (lol). Given the chance, I would undoubtedly go back for another haircut.

originalText.text:
Did the shampoo+oil treatment + haircut + blowout. Cut my hair short with layers and got a cute curtain bang. The stylists is very detailed oriented and know exactly what you want. Environment is very welcoming and friendly.
Got so many compliments for my new haircut. Would recommend going here if you are in town.

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience here!! I saw this place trending on TikTok and decided to check it out. Staff is very friendly. They wash your hair twice which was huge for me because I sometimes feel like salons don’t wash it right but my hair feels so clean and fresh. I had my hair cut and styled by Peng! She does amazing work and listened to everything I had said I wanted and cut the layers beautifully without taking off any length. 10/10 experience, I recommend to anyone

originalText.text: Enjoyed my experience at Lee Ren! Very reasonable price for wash, cut, and styling. My hair was cut and styled by Peng who was very kind and did exactly as I wanted. Will definitely visit again soon!
